description:
GROQ (Graph-Relational Object Queries) is a query language for JSON documents designed by Sanity.io. In this talk, Knut Melvær (Head of Developer Relations) announces that it’s now open source and does a short demo of the new CLI tool. Check out the specification and tooling at github.com/sanity-io/GROQ.

Recorded at JAMstack_conf_london 2019. Learn about upcoming dates and locations at https://www.jamstackconf.com
title: Knut Melvaer - We're Open-Sourcing GROQ
